name.jp: ジャイアントモンスター召喚のオーブ(B)

description.en: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.br: Irá invocar um dos Gigantes: Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma ou Kern em algum lugar próximo. Para usar, clique duas vezes no item e depois clique no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能够召唤出树精、火鸟、剑尾龟、机械象、石魔其中之一的晶球。
description.de: Ein Giant Antiquery, Giant Luia, Giant Gongury, Giant Shuhamma oder Giant Kern werden in deiner Nähe beschworen.
description.fi: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Balle d'invocation de Géant Nautrepy. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Akan memanggil Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma atau Kern di dekatnya. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.jp: アンティクエリー、ルイア、ゴングリー、シューハンマー、ケルンの中でどれか1匹のジャイアントモンスターを召喚するオーブ。使用してから召喚したい地面をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 앤티크리, 루이아, 공그리, 슈함마, 케른 중 한 종류의 거대 몬스터를 소환 하는 구슬
description.nl: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Может призвать гигантского мутэнта, лавлина, армадона, сталефанта или вогробушка. Дважды щелкните по шару, а затем укажите место на земле, где должен появиться монстр.
description.sp: Invoca a uno de los siguientes Gigantes: Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma o Kern. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Will summon a Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma or Kern nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.th: จะเรียก Giant Antiquery, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma หรือ Kern มาใกล้ๆ ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่บนพื้นเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能夠召喚出小倩的姥姥、感恩節火雞、大魔龜、爆鑽機械象、地獄爆炎王其中之一的晶球。要使用，請點擊它兩下，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Sẽ triệu hồi một Cổ vật khổng lồ, Luia, Gongury, Shuhamma hoặc Kern ở gần đó. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
